definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
to store/to save/to have in reserve/heir/Taiwan pr. [chu2]
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: In somewhat unusual fashion, the Samsung requires a tiny microSD memory card.
sentences.chinese: 三星這款相機有點與衆不同，要求微型SD存儲卡。

sentences.english: Do not use memory card close to heat-generating or combustible materials.
sentences.chinese: 請勿在靠近發熱材料或者易燃物品的場所使用存儲卡。

sentences.english: Motherboards, PC cards, Memory , HDD etc, core components.
sentences.chinese: 求購電腦主板，存儲卡，硬盤等元件，出口。
